definition: to support with the hand/to help sb up/to support oneself by holding onto something/to help
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: Mrs. Chambers sits comfortably in her  armchair, enjoying a cup of coffee.
sentences.chinese: 乔柏斯太太舒服地坐在扶手椅里，享受着一杯咖啡。

sentences.english: He dozed off in the armchair.
sentences.chinese: 他坐在扶手椅里打盹儿。

sentences.english: He lounged in an left armchair in a stance of deliberconsumed contempt.
sentences.chinese: 他懒洋洋地躺在扶手椅里，用意摆出一种藐视的架势。

sentences.english: I saw him sitting back in the armchair, drinking his beer.
sentences.chinese: 我看见他背靠扶手椅而坐，喝着啤酒。

sentences.english: In his armchair in the parlour looking out on the road.
sentences.chinese: 他在客厅的扶手椅上望着外面的道路。

sentences.english: The cat ensconced itself in the armchair.
sentences.chinese: 猫安安稳稳地蹲在扶手椅里。

sentences.english: The furniture dealer bested Mr Williams over that armchair.
sentences.chinese: 家具商使威廉斯先生上当买了那张扶手椅。

sentences.english: She sat there majestic in her armchair, filling every inch of it.
sentences.chinese: 她庄严的坐在扶手椅子上，占据了每英寸的它。

sentences.english: He is sitting in an armchair with a newspaper over his face.
sentences.chinese: 他坐在扶手椅子上用一张报纸盖着脸。

sentences.english: As soon as he reached the armchair, he plumped down into it.
sentences.chinese: 他手刚摸到扶手椅就蓦地倒入椅中。

sentences.english: The child lounged in an armchair.
sentences.chinese: 孩子懒洋洋地倚在扶手椅里。

sentences.english: In front of the window stood a large, comfortable armchair.
sentences.chinese: 窗前放着一把又大又舒适的扶手椅。

sentences.english: I sat down in the armchair.
An armchair was on the other side of the coffee table.
sentences.chinese: 茶几的另一边还有一张扶手椅。

sentences.english: He was lolling in an armchair.
sentences.chinese: 他懒洋洋地靠在扶手椅里。

sentences.english: Beside the bed is a computer desk with an accompanying armchair.
sentences.chinese: 电脑桌挨着床，有一把扶手椅陪伴。

definition: sofa (loanword)/CL:條|条[tiao2],張|张[zhang1]/(Internet slang) the first reply or replier to a forum post
